name: Pawsitive
storyline:
You find yourself in the world of Pawsitive... as a retro Tamagotchi-style puppy??

Your quest is to be the fastest player in the playerbase to craft prizes. To support your ongoing health journey, you'll actually get those prizes IRL.

Fuel your puppy with your own steps, tracked and connected with the wearable or smartphone HealthKit of your choice.
summary: Pawsitive is a healthy adventure RPG that lets you turn your healthy habits into energy for a virtual puppy. A mix between retro Tamagotchi pet games and modern health tracking, Pawsitive helps gamers reclaim their health with fun quests and healthy prizes.
